Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.utils

Class Students

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.utils.Students
public class Students extends Object
A class containing only static methods to handle collections of students efficiently

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int
    countColor(List<Student> students, Color color)
    Counts the number of students of the given Color inside the provided ArrayList of students
    static Student
    findFirstStudentOfColor(ArrayList<Student> students, Color color)
    Finds the first student of the selected Color in the given ArrayList
    static ArrayList<Student>
    getSomeStudents(int num)
    Returns a shuffled ArrayList of students containing num students of each color.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • countColor

      public static int countColor(List<Student> students, Color color)
      Counts the number of students of the given Color inside the provided ArrayList of students
      Parameters:
      students - an ArrayList of students to be counted
      color - a Color to count the students of
      Returns:
      the number of students of the given Color

    • getSomeStudents

      public static ArrayList<Student> getSomeStudents(int num)
      Returns a shuffled ArrayList of students containing num students of each color. If a negative number is provided the method returns an empty collection
      Parameters:
      num - the number of students of each color to be contained in the result
      Returns:
      a shuffled ArrayList of students containing num students of each color

    • findFirstStudentOfColor

      public static Student findFirstStudentOfColor(ArrayList<Student> students, Color color)
      Finds the first student of the selected Color in the given ArrayList
      Parameters:
      students - an ArrayList of students to search in
      color - a Color to find the first Student of
      Returns:
      the first student of the selected Color in the given ArrayList or null if not present
